question: Which Indian football player is known as "Kalo Harin"?
explanation: I M Vijayan is known as "Kalo Harin". Inivalappil Mani Vijayan, popularly known as Kalo Harin (Black Buck), is a former professional Indian football player who also captained the India national football team. He played as a striker, where he formed a successful attacking partnership with Bhaichung Bhutia for the Indian national team in the late nineties and early 2000s. Vijayan was crowned Indian Player of the Year in 1993, 1997 and 1999, the first player to win the award multiple times. He was also awarded the Arjuna Award in 2003.
